channel.title: Barrows chest keys
channel.description: I have all my dharok's,Ahrim's, torags, ect. brothers with the right random key drop, and I wanted to make it where you have to have all keys to open it, I know there is a code and I have used it before, I just can't remember it or I can't remember what void it went under.

item.title: Barrows chest keys
item.dc:creator: @akanaz akanaz
item.description:
@akanaz wrote:

I Am Trying That Same Thing And Using Deltas Code I Get 2 Errors:

client.java:6042: illegal start of type
if (objectID == 10284) {

client.java:6042: expected
if (objectID == 10284) {

Read full topic

item.title: Barrows chest keys
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

Try that

if (objectID == 10284) { if (playerHasItem(2840) && playerHasItem(2838) && playerHasItem(2836) && playerHasItem(2834) && playerHasItem(2832) && playerHasItem(2411)) { deleteItem(2840, 1); deleteItem(2838, 1); deleteItem(2836, 1); deleteItem(2834, 1); deleteItem(2832, 1); deleteItem(2411, 1); int[] items = { 4708, 4710, 4712, 4714, 4716, 4718, 4720, 4722, 4724, 4726, 4728, 4730, 4732, 4734, 4736, 4738, 4745, 4747, 4749, 4751, 4753, 4755, 4757, 4759 }; int r = (int) (Math.random() * items.length); addItem(items[r], 1); teleportToX = 2611; teleportToY = 3095; sendMessage("You recieve an Item from the Barrows Chest."); } else sendMessage("You need the 6 barrow keys."); }

Read full topic

Search for this in client.java:

if (objectID ==

After that code is over and after the last }, Add that. Remember to add the Teleport there through a portal or whatever, then add the correct key ids to your npcdrops as mine, or just change mine to yours.

item.title: Barrows chest keys
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

I use this for mine, I know it’s not right, but it’s as close as I got:

if (objectID == 10284) { if (playerHasItem(2840) && playerHasItem(2838) && playerHasItem(2836) && playerHasItem(2834) && playerHasItem(2832) && playerHasItem(2411)) { deleteItem(2840, 1); deleteItem(2838, 1); deleteItem(2836, 1); deleteItem(2834, 1); deleteItem(2832, 1); deleteItem(2411, 1); int[] items = { 4708, 4710, 4712, 4714, 4716, 4718, 4720, 4722, 4724, 4726, 4728, 4730, 4732, 4734, 4736, 4738, 4745, 4747, 4749, 4751, 4753, 4755, 4757, 4759 }; int r = (int) (Math.random() * items.length); addItem(items[r], 1); teleportToX = 2611; teleportToY = 3095; sendMessage("You recieve an Item from the Barrows Chest."); } else { sendMessage("You need all the keys before you can open the Barrows Chest!"); } }

Read full topic
